import React from 'react'; import waterCrisisImg from '../water_crisis.jpg'; const Challenges = () => (

Challenges of Excessive Water Usage

  • üåä Excessive Consumption: Excessive consumption of freshwater resources driven by agriculture, industrial processes, and everyday household use puts immense strain on available water supplies.
  • ‚ö†Ô∏è Hidden Water Usage: Hidden water usage embedded in the supply chain ‚Äî many people remain unaware of the vast amounts of water required to produce everyday items, from clothing and food to electronics.
  • üè≠ Pollution Impact: High levels of pollution raise the grey water footprint, meaning even more clean water is needed to dilute and neutralize contaminants before the water can safely return to the environment.
  • üå°Ô∏è Climate Change: Climate change, rapid population growth, and ineffective water management systems are intensifying water scarcity and amplifying stress on global freshwater resources.
  • üêü Ecological Disruption: Over-extraction and contamination of rivers, lakes, and groundwater disrupt aquatic ecosystems, threatening biodiversity and the health of natural habitats.
); export default Challenges;
